TeamContent: We are a small team of Python developers, interested in mobile development, particularly Android at the moment.
GoalContent: We want to create little games and applications ourselves and share them with you. Publishing the code of our projects as open-source is a value we hold dear to contribute to the community.
WorkContent: To develop our games and mobile applications, we use Python's Kivy library, which enables us to distribute our code on all platforms.
ContactContent: We would be happy to hear from you if you would like to report an error in our applications, or if you would like to suggest new ideas.
ContactLink: Do not hesitate to contact us at:
